Active Blogs Deliver 97% More Leads...

This week's blog is about the power of e-mail and social media, and the statistics that reveal you underestimate it at your peril.  

It has been found that companies with active blogs receive an amazing 97% more leads than their competitors. In addition, B2B companies maintaining blogs generate on average 67% more leads per month than non-blogging firms.  

Companies that invest a minimum of six hours a week on social media marketing see 78% increased website traffic, 64% increase in lead generation and 60% increased search rankings.  

  • Read more about Active Blogs Deliver 97% More Leads...
